website_summaries.verdict: If you plan on being on the go, this diaper bag backpack is not to be missed.
pros: Offers front and back separate pockets for a large amount of storage
Unisex design makes this perfect for moms and dads
Available in grey or dark grey

customer_reviews.title: Holds alot
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My wife can fit 10 pounds of crap in this 5 pound bag. It's also looks a lot better than the other three we have that are also filled with a endless supply of baby stuff. I'm talking enough for two kids. That's like 10 diapers, two change of clothes for each, pacifiers, toys, wipes (10 million count) no typo, changing mats, bottles, ice packs, flame thrower, spare tire (although she doesn't know how to change one), snacks (enough to feed a small army) first aid kit, and poop bags. I might have forgot like 20 things so you will have to excuse me.
customer_reviews.author: HarelyMama

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it, but it hurt
customer_reviews.text: So I love the layout and pockets of this bag... I also loved that it had a spot for my water bottle... but the yoke of shoulder straps is really small and it hurt. My friend who has small shoulders (backpack and bra straps are forever slipping down...) lives the fit. Unfortunately, I had to return. 3 stars because I loved the lay out.
customer_reviews.author: Brisco

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! I use to use a open style thirty one shoulder bag but switched to this. I was afraid the back pack wouldn't store as much but am pleasantly surprised. The style and color are also great, with comfortable straps. I was looking for something that would fit cloth diapers and this bag works well. I can easily fit 6-8 pocket diapers in the main section, which is plenty for a day trip. We also took it on a trip across the country and it worked as a great carry on, fitting plenty of snacks, toys, and outfits for the long flight.
customer_reviews.author: Randy bunce

customer_reviews.title: Broken zipper
customer_reviews.text: It's nice but showed up with a broken zipper and I haven't been able to reach someone to fix the problem without just returning it and being without a bag for our trip.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service AND Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This bag has so much room for everything you HAVE TO carry around for your baby. It's very comfortable to wear too. After using this product for 3 months, the front pocket's button (on the inside) has somehow broken off. Also, one of the arm/shoulder strap's adjustable, plastic piece has also snapped in half when being adjusted. I contacted HapTim and told them about the problems I had with my Diaper Bag. They immediately responded and were happy to assist me. I am receiving a replacement bag soon, as they have upgraded the durability and possible problem areas I have had trouble with. Great service and product!
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great bag but stitching is coming out 😔
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I absolutely love this bag and I have gotten so many compliments on it! But... I've only had it maybe a month and at the top of the right strap the stitching is coming undone, I am so sad about this! Wish I knew how to get it fixed or a new one? I want to give it 5 stars but that is definitely holding me back.
customer_reviews.author: TFristrup

customer_reviews.title: Beware of faulty seams
customer_reviews.text: I actually really like the look and functionality of the bag but unfortunately, after only a month of use the seams on the shoulder strap started to give and I couldn't use it as a back pack. It's really too bad, it's a nice bag and I received several compliments on the style, but the truth is I can't use it any more.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Bulky & tips over easily! :(
customer_reviews.text: Pro: This bag is very well constructed made from sturdy/durable canvas material. It has so many great pockets! I wear my son in a carrier so having a backpack is very convenient. Con: My main gripe is that this bag is extremely top heavy and tips over very easily. My sister asked me why I brought so much stuff -- I didn't! It's the bag! It feels heavy (even with minimal items inside) and is very bulky (I almost knocked over a little old lady walking by because I didn't realize how far out it extended - reminds me of my 3rd trimester days!). Unfortunately, I will need to go back to my shoulder bag.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda T

customer_reviews.title: ... with its size and has many pockets which are great but many go unused
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very functional with its size and has many pockets which are great but many go unused, by us at least. After having an over the shoulder bag, we wanted a back pack to make things a lot easier to bend over and pick things up with the bag on, something we end up doing a lot more with an infant/toddler. Gender neutral coloring also made this a good choice for my wife and I. However, giving this 3 stars because shortly after use, maybe about less than 3 months in, one of the stroller straps started fraying, pictures attached. It has held up so far but looks like it can go at any time.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: We got this to use after baby number 2 arrived. We loved it initially and even bought one for my brother shortly after. It looks sharp and the packets/size are great! However not even 3 months after we began using it the plastic clasp on the shoulder strap broke. I have wrote the company and have not heard anything back about getting it fixed or replaced. Although we love the bag for two kids the fact that it broke that soon and there is no follow up from the company is disappointing and we will not be buying this bag again nor buying from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sworsky

customer_reviews.title: a great find! So many compartments to organize everything you ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a back pack syle diaper bag for baby #2, and this is def. a great find! So many compartments to organize everything you need for your baby, and even personal items for yourself to eliminate another bulky purse. The quality is made well. I bought mine on a flash sale. So was really excited I saved a little more, but even at full price, it's totally worth the money. Def. get this if you're looking for a bag that will make your life easier. It's a great unisex bag for the Mr. to carry as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Ann Duvall

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great storage!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Strong, great quality and well made. The straps are very comfortable and feels great on your back. The material cleans easily and stands up to machine washing although according to the instructions that are included, machine washing is not recommended. The backpack offers great storage, having more than enough room to store more than everything you could have for a baby. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Great storage capacity!
customer_reviews.text: This diaper bag works great for two young kids. I use the front pockets for food and there are enough of them that I can keep each child's snacks and bibs separate. The back is roomy enough to store a travel potty for my older child and a small bag with essentials for my younger child (diapers, wipes, nursing cover, etc). I'm very happy with the layout of the bag and it's very comfortable to wear. It also attaches to both my umbrella and everyday strollers with great ease. Would definitely recommend! ----EDIT---- Added a video!
customer_reviews.author: The Pop's

customer_reviews.title: I been using it for the last 4 months and I love everything about it
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so well made, I been using it for the last 4 months and I love everything about it, I can tell is going to last. Update: its been a year and it still looks brand new. Don't think about it. Buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for weak stitching
customer_reviews.text: We had this for 9 months when it started ripping. The top of the backpack straps are coming apart. We have other diaper bags that have lasted 4.5 years but using this one for a short time, I’ve had to sew it twice. Right on the top part where the straps come together. We don’t load it down so I was surprised the stitching would do that.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Chose this style as I do not like wearing large purse style bags
customer_reviews.text: Stylish bag. Have gotten compliments on it especially from men. Chose this style as I do not like wearing large purse style bags, and we were looking for a bag that we can both use. It is roomy. Love attaching it on the stroller as it looks great still. The diaper pad is helpful to have, too. The bottle spaces are insulated, so that's great. And a lot of sections to keep things apart. I would definitely recommend this diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Twinster2

customer_reviews.title: Best. Diaper. Bag. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: The only regret I have buying this bag is not having it sooner. We just had our second baby, our first is 2. This bag provides space for everything we need for two kids, including extra clothes, bottles, diapers, wipes, toys, etc. The pockets help keep everything organized. The material feels very durable, and the extra padding on the back makes it really comfortable to carry. If they offered more colors, we would buy them all. Definitely perfect for mom and dad to carry, not too girly, not too masculine. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: We used it daily and loved it. I was highly disappointed when the handle ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my two boys in March. We used it daily and loved it. I was highly disappointed when the handle started to tear and the plastic on the strap broke! I contacted the company and even though it was out of their return window, they sent me a new bag! I would highly recommend their customer service! I am hopeful the new bag will hold up longer than the first because this bag is perfect for us!
customer_reviews.author: katherine white

customer_reviews.title: Great organization.
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! It kept us super organized on an international trip. Also, it is really comfortable to carry and good looking. The only negative is that I think the changing pad is too thin and could use a bit more structure. It was light and easy to pack in different ways, though, so I ended up using it over swapping it with another we have. I purchased for our trip, but have kept it as the diaper bag at home as well.
customer_reviews.author: ER03313

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! holds a lot of stuff!  Perfect for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Just took on a five day trip with the family. Looks good. Sturdy. Perfect amount of pockets. Holds tons of stuff. In the very front pocket I hold tissues and sunblock. First large compartment I hold all food related items. Second large compartment I hold all diaper and clothes related items. Side pockets hold milk and water bottle. One small pocket hold my keys and cell phone. Second small pocket holds my emergency items cash, chapstick, lotion, ID, etc. There is still a secret pocket at the very back trip that I didn't use. Prob good for passports in needed bc pick pocketers will never get there hands there.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! The only thing I wish I could change is where the wipes go. In my previous back pack diaper bag I had, the pocket for the wipes had a zipper for it. On this bag the pocket is just open, which sucks because when my backpack is full of things the wipes fall out. Other than that it has a lot of pockets and is super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Hope Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Never going back!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag because we are going to be flying soon and I thought it would be easier to use than the over-the-shoulder bag we had but now I don't think I can go back! I genuinely love this bag and my husband doesn't mind wearing it either! There are several storage pockets and you can fit a ton of stuff in it without it feeling bulky. I love the small outside pockets that easily fit my phone, chapstick, ect. without having to dig around and the key hook is brilliant! It is very comfortable to wear on my back while chasing around my toddler and I love how organized everything is!
customer_reviews.author: 3lgal

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best diaper bag I have ever used. There are so many pockets and pouches that EVERYTHING has a place. Perfect for newborns on up. The straps are nice and padded so it does not hurt my shoulders or back. The insides are a waterproof material, so I’m not afraid of ruining it with all things baby. It’s lovely, but not too feminine, so my husband doesn’t mind taking it when he takes our son out by himself. I have a feeling that I’ll be using this bag for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Had this bag for about 5 months now - LOVE IT! I have a 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: Had this bag for about 5 months now - LOVE IT! I have a 4 year old, 2 year old, and 7 month old. It holds changes of clothes for emergency/accidents for the older 2, pull ups, a foldable potty seat, wet ones sanitizing wipes, wet wipes, small first aide stuff, feeding utensils, diapers, food, and baby changes of clothes - and there's still room! It takes a beating and keeps on giving! Zippers and material are durable and strong. Straps have held up well & adjust easily. I'm telling you, this bag is tough and has all the storage you need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this diaper bag. Husband was surprised and even said he won't mind carrying this around for baby. Love it. Only downside is transporting milk - not sure if the cooler liners will keep milk cold enough for extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book bag as a baby shower gift, but now I'm keeping it for myself (my husband) because it's so versatile and nice. The quality is great & it has several compartments. I didn't realize the interior was going to be burgundy and white stripes when I purchased it and I actually love that (so classy). Best of all, there's a ton of storage and also insulated pockets. The straps are cushioned, another plus! Oh, and there's some little cushioned compartment in the back. This is the perfect every day bag & as my husband said "this is a good dad bag" :) Now I'm going to order another one for the baby shower it was intended for.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and working bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag as an additional diaper bag for travel since I have a toddler AND an infant! I stopped using my Petunia Picklebottom bag because it just didn't fit enough and was a messenger bag. I get so many compliments on the look and I have to say that the compartments are so incredibly useful! It holds enough stuff for my family of 4 while making sure there is all of the essential baby items packed away. It isn't the most expensive back pack diaper bag out there (terms of quality), but it has help up through 6 plane trips (12 back and forth) and COUNTLESS trips around town.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L

customer_reviews.title: I love Everything about this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love Having this bag! I bought This after my name brand bag had ripped just using it for 2 months. I haven’t had any issues with this bag! The storage is unlike anything if seen in other bags, the stroller straps are so convenient, and it does amazing in the rain! I’ve had this bag out st football games in the pouring down rain, and it truly keeps everything on the interior nice and dry! Also, customer service is great!! They work with you on any mishaps, and the warranty is awesome! Would 100% recommend this diaper bag!
customer_reviews.author: Ajslater15

customer_reviews.title: Faulty zipper!?
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy to clean plenty of storage but not great quality. After 3 months or use one of the zippers came off due to the zipper stop coming unfastened. Now I have it safety pinned to keep the other zipper from falling off. I don’t know if I got a defective one but I broken zipper on the main compartment is a deal breaker wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Megan512

customer_reviews.title: really big not very fashionable
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality and how comfortable it is i having my sencond baby and i have a 2 and half year old that potty train but i still bring a set of clothes snack and few pull ups anx of course i want all my new born stuff to fit in one bag, this bag hold everything even my bulky wallet and my 40oz water jug, i did give it 4 stars because it get bulky and i won't use it for quick errands if i am going to be out the whole day out of the house or i am traveling this is my bag but for everyday use i am just not comfortable using it
customer_reviews.author: Yasmely Cardona

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: What a great backpack! I got this to accommodate my 2.5yo and my baby on the way. Tons of space inside and I think it will be easy to divide the two kids' things in the two large zipper pockets to keep them separate and organize and easy to get to. My son's water bottle fits nicely and easily in the side pocket and I put my phone in the other side! Much better than our previous Graco backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Tabi

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT....BEST backpack diaper bag I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I have had maybe 8 “diaper bags” in my 40 years of life and this is by far the BEST!!! The way this backpack diaper bag feels on your body is amazing and the pockets are perfect for my contigo water bottles, full size hand sanitizer and wipes and diapers and an entire 3 year-olds full outfit in case we have an accident! Buy it! You won’t regret it!!! I have fancy diaper bags like JJ coles ($150) and this one is higher quality and withstands more abuse!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Myczka

customer_reviews.title: You can fit SO much stuff in this bag and easily get to everything because both of the bigger compartments ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 other diaper bags before purchasing this one and I have never gone back to using the old ones. You can fit SO much stuff in this bag and easily get to everything because both of the bigger compartments open fully. We fly a lot and this has held everything we’ve needed for our baby on the plane, it’s comfortable for both me and my husband to wear. The cup holders on either side fit both bottles and the sippy cups we use. I also really like that there are many smaller pockets that are great to put pacifiers or snacks in so that they’re quickly accessible. HIGHLY recommend this diaper bag!
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality. Lots of room! You will love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE : After using for the past 15 months, this bag has been durable, and shows no signs of wear! Great size. I thought I wanted bigger, but it would be too big and bulky if it was any larger. Durable. No loose threads, lots of small pockets for keys, phone and coffee. My only complaint is the zippers are so smooth they open on their own unless fully closed. Practically perfect. Hopefully the last diaper bag I will ever own!
customer_reviews.author: CO

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Great diaper bag! I have two kiddos, a newborn and toddler. This bag holds everything we need and then some! It has a bunch of pockets for stashing all the essentials for traveling around with tiny people. We live in the city and take public transportation, so fair warning, if you fill the bag, you will not be popular on a busy train. It does stick out quite a bit when full.
customer_reviews.author: SKM

customer_reviews.title: Two Under Two- Love It
customer_reviews.text: Was struggling w being prepared after baby #2 with my petunia diaper bag I had been using with my now two year old. Did a little research and found HapTim. Def a great stylish bag for enough room for two kiddos! I do wish they had a couple leather elements to it for style and would pay extra for it but 100% recommend for a mom out and about with two under two. My hubby loved it as well and purchased his own!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Sabedra

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a newborn or younger babies! Pros: Two separate compartments- good for organization Wide base so you can fit more Durable Stylish and has a very clean design Cons: May be too big once baby is older since you won’t need to pack as many things Pockets for bottles may not be big enough for some bottles- especially brands that have the wider natural shape like Tommee Tippee
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS BAG
customer_reviews.text: I had the JuJu BFF bag for about $175, a skiphop backpack, and a Kate Spade Purse diaper bag. This beat them all by a lot!! It's perfect for as much travelling as we do and fits everything! Downside is we fill it up so it gets pretty heavy but all the padding makes it comfortable to wear and I love being able to clip it onto the stroller. I really can't recommend this bag more.
customer_reviews.author: YaritNYR

customer_reviews.title: Great for plus size, tall people and men
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 5'8" tall plus size 18/20 woman, and this fits me so nicely. I bought a diaper backpack that i would have loved except the straps weren't long enough so it dug into my armpits. Not this one! This diaper backpack is SUPER COMFY. My husband is about 5'10", muscular build and this fits him great too. UPDATE: This diaper backpack got stolen out of my truck, and though I'm giving a little look to see what else is out there, I'm almost certain I'm just going to buy this one again. It really was confortable, and did great on two international trips with the baby.
customer_reviews.author: The Evil Ear

customer_reviews.title: Best baby purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my best purchase baby related. This diaper bag has all the storage and pockets you could ask for in the convenience of the backpack style. We have used this for 19 months straight and it literally still looks new as well as still being in perfect condition. Would absolutely recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: McLain

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: CHEAPLY MADE backpack!!! NOT WORTH THE MONEY!!! I purchased this backpack off of amazon less than 6 months ago. The main support back strap has already torn in half. The plastic buckle is cracked. I am extremely disappointed in this product. Amazon won’t even send me a new one. The zipper has also never worked smoothly. Always gets stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Chels05

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart at the seams!!
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed this bag until it started falling apart literally at the seams. The stitching on this bag is very weak. To me this is way to pricey for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Cannon

customer_reviews.title: ... traditional baby bag I had for #1 and it’s great! Plenty of compartments
customer_reviews.text: Opted for thistle baby #2 over the traditional baby bag I had for #1 and it’s great! Plenty of compartments, comfortable to wear and the stroller straps are handy too. My only complaint is that it’s “front heavy” and doesn’t sit up right, no matter how the bag is packed. Overall, I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jessmtws

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag ever
customer_reviews.text: Me and my husband share and it's amazing! I've gone through so many diaper bags and purses. I have 2 boys so it hold clothes bottles/ water bottles, tablet, wallet, tons of diapers I mean and it doesn't bulge. It has amazing back support. So worth it
customer_reviews.author: Niki Nira

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as their claim
customer_reviews.text: We've had the bag for 5 months and the top strap has completely broken off despite the claim in the description. Not impressed!! HIGH QUALITY & WATERPROOF -- Our diaper backpack made of high quality Nylon garment fabric with PU back coating(stronger than polyester,higher strength, higher wear resistance,good resistance to deformation), non-fraying stitching, and strong zippers means you’ll have a bag that lasts for years.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: The wife absolutely loves this new backpack! She was ...
customer_reviews.text: The wife absolutely loves this new backpack! She was a bit hesitant because there aren't too many new moms who carry a backpack, but when she saw how much easier it was when I carried my backpack instead of using her big a$$ bag with all the stuff you need pilled in one or two compartments, she tried it out! let me say, this one is especially made for new moms! A mom definitely designed this one with everything in mind!
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pockets, not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag for my sister as a gift. She has used it and loved it for about 9 months now. Recently, the plastic buckle broke off of one of the straps. She is very disappointed because she LOVES this thing and all the Space and pockets it has but now it is difficult to use since the strap will no longer stay up on her shoulder. I am disappointed that it didn’t hold up very long!
customer_reviews.author: Niccole Gassert

customer_reviews.title: Quality Bag with Great Organization
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very sturdy and made with high quality materials and has many compartments for staying organized! I was especially surprised by how well protected the inside of the bag is, so would work great for a laptop or other device. Would highly recommend this seller and this bag for any student or parent looking to keep everything in its place!
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyQ80

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for just under 4 months. Today, the zipper came off of the larger front pocket. After further examination, the stitching came loose where the zipper starts. I am not hard on this bag and this was not a pocket that was unzipped that often. I have really enjoyed this bag, as it holds everything my infant and toddler need, but I expected it to last a lot longer than 4 months, especially since it isn’t used everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Breeden

customer_reviews.title: My favorite diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Disneyland trip with 2 toddlers and it was awesome. It was the "go to" bag for everyone. I love the separate pockets so that I could pack one pocket full or drinks and snacks and one with diapers, wipes, fans, toys, ect. The tiny pockets were perfect for keys, eyedrops, chapstick, ect. They were easy to reach and close without digging around in my bag. I love the buckles at the top so that I can attach this to grocery carts and strollers. It is by far my favorite diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Matt W.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pockets!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag with lots of storage for clothes food and toys. The bag holds its shape and stands strong even when shoved with dad and mom’s stuff along with kid’s. The only problem was the front most pocket. It was two thin to hold even just a few diapers and a diaper cream when the bag is full.
customer_reviews.author: A2Z

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack, lots of compliments, but horrendous chemical smell out of packaging
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a higher rating except it smelled so badly of plastic or chemicals when it first arrived I had to put it out on my deck for days to air out because my whole living room smelled like chemicals. So once it aired out and no longer smelled, it feels great, is sturdy and comfortable, great compartments. But in the back of my mind I’m afraid the material istoxic or something because of The super strong odor at the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Xantus

customer_reviews.title: Dad-Diaper Bag
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my lil brother. He and his wife are expected their first kid (boy). Because my little brother is a, "manly man," I got him thus Dad-diaper bag. And got it personalized. Showers Sat but I know it wont disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McCradic

customer_reviews.title: Love my new diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I’m picky about bags. I bought 10 of these type and sent the other 9 back. Love all the pockets and I get compliments on it all the time. One of the inner pockets came ripped when I got it but it’s not noticeable and it’s easily fixable. I recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K.

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT NOW!
customer_reviews.text: In. Love. With. This. Diaper. Bag!!! This is my third diaper bag I’ve tried in the last year and finally I found something great. So much storage and it’s separated out so your not digging through one large opening to get stuff. And it’s like extra tall. I wasn’t expecting that. It look me weeks of suffering with an awful bag that was breaking at the straps to commit to this one because I wanted to make sure if I was gonna spend money on it that I was gonna like it. A friend recommended this and I will never look back. ITS GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Chaffin

customer_reviews.title: Special Needs Parents
customer_reviews.text: This bag will fit a small M6 oxygen tank and pulse oximeter along with clothes and other needed supplies without issue. It would be nice if the baby wipes could be attached to the outside of the bag as in some models. There is a small pocket at the top that is just right for carrying small medicines like inhalers and or a phone. Plenty of space and easy to carry as it is a back pack. The stroller straps are also good to insert a lanyard for an oxygen key.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Price

customer_reviews.title: Awesome multi-function diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a diaper bag for the dads for sure. This diaper bag looks just like a stylish backpack but has all the functionality of a diaper bag in one. Tons of storage and insulated compartments as well. Love the cushions on the back for comfort! Will use this as my main bag from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bag for a year now and it’s still going strong! Has spots and pockets for everything! My favorite feature is the side pockets for my kids camelbak waterbottles! Most bags are too small for these cups to fit. Only issue was a strong chemical smell when I first got it but it quickly disappeared. A few seams are getting ragged now but we beat this bag up and take it everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Molly M.

customer_reviews.title: Literally perfect
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is absolutely amazing. I looked up many backpacks, read reviews, and decided to go with this one. I'm so glad I did. I liked my diaper bag but with my 3 year old in a wheelchair, it gets difficult to carry everything. This backpack fits a ridiculous amount of stuff! I wish I would have ordered one years ago. The material is amazing, easy to clean, and anywhere I go people always comment on it. Do yourself a favor and order this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: but overall the product is fine. they could add some pockets on the straps
customer_reviews.text: the back pack doest stand . so it s a pain in the ass cause if you don t hang it , or lay it down somewher it will keep falling.. and sometimes it would be practical to stand , so you can just pull out the diapers and baby stuff and use one hand to be more practical. . but overall the product is fine . they could add some pockets on the straps, .. would be great
customer_reviews.author: ania

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, functionality, and good looks!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this diaper backpack. It has a ton of pockets and room four gear, but isn't too big. Both my husband and I wear it comfortably. It is super cute. I get compliments all the time. Definitely higher quality than offers I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: The Mary Poppins of Diaper bags.
customer_reviews.text: So. Much. Space!! easy to organize the inside with pouches and little zipper compartments. I had been looking for a bag that could fit my baby things and some of my toddlers clothes. This bag is perfect for it. It is also very light and easy to tote around.
customer_reviews.author: WineandCheese

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome. Now I haven't purchased any other bags, so I cannot compare to other...but that being said... I love all of the compartments. Tons of space for anything you could wish to carry and the way the bag works, it's easy to organize everything however works best for you.
customer_reviews.author: Wall

customer_reviews.title: Dad approved!
customer_reviews.text: Dad loves this design! Mom loves that dad will wear it! This is our second diaper bag! I perfer duffle more organized by Hie but he loves this. I like three pockets for bottles and only thing is missing is diaper changing pad-
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Update: customer service is great! Helped me, and I am totally satisfied with the service. I mean it’s a fine backpack. The the pockets have already ripped, I’ve had it for about a month. And once you have it packed accessing anything is impossible unless you take everything out. Plus it’s bulky even when it’s empty.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Holzapfel

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This diaper backpack is Awesome! Wanted something that was good quality and functional for my husband but not a traditional diaper bag or messenger bag style. Carrying something on his back was a must for him to be able to have both hands available. Well he loves it, It's very stylish and he likes using it! We now have 2 children and this baby can fit everything we need for 2 kids...otherwise might be a little bit much for only one as a day to day bag. It has so many pockets, insulated bottle holders, changing pad, cell phone pocket, drink pockets on outside, it has everything! Would be perfect for travel also! Would absolutely recommend 😊
customer_reviews.author: Michelle LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this diaper bag! It has so many different compartments in and out of it. It is huge so not only do I use it for a diaper bag, I also use it for a personal bag as well. I can fit clothes, shoes, lunch, and many many more items in it comfortably. It has cushion on the straps and the lower back of the diaper bag so it feels very comfortable. Well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction. Offered a replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Functional but poorly made. 2 (instead of 1) stars because company has sent a replacement free of charge even though it was past the return date. Strap was coming apart. Items with similar design can be bought for less than half the price. I appreciate the replacement but wish I bought something more expensive that lasts longer from a company like jujube.
customer_reviews.author: Spring Daphne

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I buy this sooner?!?
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I am jinxing myself but hopefully not! I have had this backpack on my shopping list for 8 months and I just decided to buy it last week. Why didn't I do it sooner?? I feel like it was made for my back so it is very comfortable. It has the best system of pockets and I couldn't be happier :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Castro

customer_reviews.title: I am babyless, but I still love this diaper bag.
customer_reviews.text: I have no baby, but I LOVE this bag. I was looking for a new bag that can hold all my massive law school books with a good amount of compartments. Have had several of my friends ask me about it, and I know at least one who purchased it. The two sections let me easily divide between textbooks and notebooks. Two drink pouches to fit my hydroflask and a cup of iced coffee. Easily accessible front pouches for my wallet and pens/pencils. Also great carryon bag for flying or overnight trips. LOVE THIS BAG.
customer_reviews.author: youngb819

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had it for 2 mos nowbecause we needed a more practical diaper bag/ bag pack for traveling. This has been great and I have actually replaced our usual diaper bag with this even for non-travel purposes.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Really glad I bought this. At first I wasn't sure if I'd keep it because the layout isn't exactly what I would want, but now I can't imagine how I lived without it! So much easier than a diaper bag and fits Everything! And it's Comfortable! ...just wish there was a spot for my phone on the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Don't Hesitate to Buy It
customer_reviews.text: After months and months of carrying around a non functional shoulder diaper bag, I wised up. When you have a toddler running around you need both arms, all the time. This diaper bag has all the room you need and makes life so much easier. And if you are planning to take a vacation with a two year old, this is a must!
customer_reviews.author: teachkk

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This bag is really nice. Plenty of room. We bottle feed and their is plenty of room for 3 bottles and formula in one pocket. There is plenty of room for changing items- diapers, wipes, pad, extra clothes. It has plenty of pockets for extras too likr snacks for my older son, pacifiers, wallet, keys etc... I have had no problems with zippers or quality of the bag. We have been using it for 6 weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: amanda mcfadden

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Amazing!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I don't normally write a review but this product is a steal for the price! I have worked retail for 18 years and this is a quality product and they thought of everything for convenience for parents! I'm a mother of three under 4 and it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned - Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Got this because it looked quite stylish. Was not impressed when we received it. For the price, it's probably great for some people. I just thought it looked cheap and kind of silly in person. Definitely has that "Made in China" type of vibe. For now we're just using my trusty North Face city backpack and you know what--it works just fine. :)
customer_reviews.author: Quite Nicely

customer_reviews.title: Incredible diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Amazing backpack diaper bag. Purchased it for travel to use as our carry on and diaper bag and it had plenty of room for everything we needed and then some! I didn't intend to use it daily, but it's so functional that I haven't switched back to my very expensive designer diaper bag. Highly recommend this bag. The overall scoop - large, comfortable to carry, lots of compartments, water resistant fabric, plenty of separation for cold stuff/wet stuff to stay away from clean stuff. LOTS of pockets and zipper pouches. Great price. So glad I read other reviews and chose this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Ripped from use
customer_reviews.text: We loved this backpack for storage room and lots of different pockets. However, after a little over a year it ripped by the zipper and now we can't use it anymore. This should have held up much better.
customer_reviews.author: ilovethisbook

customer_reviews.title: Great for parents!
customer_reviews.text: So much room to pack for twins! It's stylish for both me and my husband to carry with no annoying over the shoulder bags! Recommend for every parent! We will turn it into a regular backpack when we don't need it as a diaper bag. Great material and will be easy to wash or wipe down.
customer_reviews.author: QueenAnne

customer_reviews.title: Best Diaper Bag EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I was skeptical when my husband bought this backpack, I quickly regretted not buying wayyyyy earlier. This backpack is simply amazing! Super light weight, tons of side pockets, a hidden outside pocket for your phone, two slings to attach the bag to the stroller, etc etc Don’t even think about getting something else!
customer_reviews.author: nanomic

customer_reviews.title: Good For Traveling
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for a flight with my daughter. I like the bag. It has a lot of pockets and seems to be pretty good quality. My biggest issue is the design with all the pockets. There is very little room to put additional things in the bag if you fill the pockets, or you just don't use the pockets. I like the stroller buckles. I used them to clip my baby carries through security and on the plane when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Nay

customer_reviews.title: its ok.
customer_reviews.text: looks good but bigger than expected, wouldn't fit under my stroller even though there is a lot of space. I ended up buying a jeep one that looks and works much better.
customer_reviews.author: bethany

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bag! It is very stylish and gender neutral. Easy to carry around and comfortable on my back. There are several different pockets in it so it is easy to organize (if my husband puts stuff back where it goes.) :)
customer_reviews.author: Shawn & Kristen Newton

customer_reviews.title: tons of space, lots of pockets
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this backpack! It has tons of space, lots of pockets, and is organized so well. I personally love the stroller straps, it's so nice to not have to adjust the shoulder straps for the stroller. I also love the secret pocket on the back. It fits my phone perfectly and is easy to get to when I'm wearing the backpack.
customer_reviews.author: ctowndm09

customer_reviews.title: Solid bag
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, lots of storage space and very neutral design. Both my husband and I are comfortable wearing this diaper backpack out on family trips. I'm really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: So great. Plenty of space and several compartments to help with whatever “organization” you are attempting as a mommy. Very nice looking too. My husband likes it because it’s not super “girly.” It definitely has the feminine touch though!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis M.

customer_reviews.title: Kick-ass Diaper Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is an absolute live-saver. I’m a first-time Mom and I have been running into the issue of having multiple bags when going to my step-daughter’s Volleyball tournaments and it became a big hassle so I turned to Amazon for a solution and found this bag. It is perfect for a full day’s trip!!! I recommend this to everyone! And it’s soooo well-made and comfortable to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag serves its purpose for schlepping all of my 3yo and 4mo kids’ stuff around. I use the larger back section for diapers, wipes, and spare clothes, and the front section for snacks and toys. The smaller compartments inside make great hiding places for my keys; it’s always a fun game when my tired mom-brain kicks in and I forget where I stashed them. Definitely recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for about 3 months and it already tore at the seams where the zipper is. I hate that I bought this way before I would be using this because now the warranty no longer covers it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: So much room!
customer_reviews.text: This diaper bag is amazing. Theres always room to spare- I don't have to stuff everything inside. It seems pretty durable, a lot of pockets, and is cute. Its comfortable too. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: SO MUCH STORAGE. This diaper bag has so much space and so many pockets. The material is thick and seems to be very well made. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Upon Grace

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, good fabric
customer_reviews.text: The quality and look of this bag is awesome. I gave 4 stars because there isn't a lot of organization in it. You kind of just shove everything into the large backpack pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Diaper Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great quality backpack! Have given this to several friends and family members. Fits everything you need, and then stuff for you! Had crayons melt in it and it wiped out clean!
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: There is a ripped seam in an obvious party of the back pack. I reached out to seller but no reply. Other then that it’s actually really cute and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! Could not parent without!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this!! I take it everywhere!! Why didn’t I have a backpack with my first two children?! If I have a complaint, it’s that I lose things in all the awesome pockets!!! This is truly an amazing diaper bag!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia R.

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review: Great Bag & Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review: The organization reached out to me after I left feedback about a concern with the durability and they completely solved the issue. It would appear I experienced a one time manufacturing fluke. This is a great bag!
customer_reviews.author: Cory Warnick

customer_reviews.title: High quality. Very comfortable. Very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. Works perfectly for everything I need. I highly recommend this bag. Easy zippers. Lots of space and pockets. Lots of cushion for back support.
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack/purse
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who has a toddler and newborn. She can put everything she needs in this backpack and still have hands free for the kids. She loves everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Young

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after one week, but good other than that
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great bag but I was super bummed it ripped after only a week. It ripped on both sides of the top handle. I only use that handle to put it in and out of the car and that bag isn’t super heavy so I’m not sure why it broke. However for now it doesn’t effect my everyday use of the diaper bag, the look is great and easy to clean I do wish they had an out side zip pocket for diapers but it’s not a deal breaker for me, just a feature of my old bag that I liked.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Demple

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: Tons of pockets make it easy to find what I need quickly but it’s huge so it held absolutely everything we needed for long flights or a full day at Disney.
customer_reviews.author: D. Otts

product_meta.title: HapTim Multi-Function Large Baby Diaper Bag Backpack W/Stroller Straps-Insulated Pockets-Changing Pad, Stylish & Durable with Anti-Water Material(Gray-5284)
feature_bullets: STYLISH & HANDSFREE -- Fashional backpack diaper bag, it reliably holds all your essential items for baby care (like diapers, food, and extra clothing) - freeing up your hands,You can even strap it to your stroller

HIGH QUALITY & WATERPROOF -- Our diaper backpack made of high quality Nylon garment fabric with PU back coating(stronger than polyester,higher strength, higher wear resistance,good resistance to deformation), non-fraying stitching, and strong zippers means you’ll have a bag that lasts for years

LARGE CAPACITY -- It's a big diaper bag organizer with 17 internal & external pockets for endless organization options,2 big sperated compartments allow you to organize all your supplies and your baby’s supplies with ease, Diaper bag size: 18*14*7 inches

COMFORTABLE & PRACTICAL & CONVENIENT -- Choice of stroller straps,grab handles and padded shoulder straps make you full day comfortable. Insulated bottle/sippy cups pockets store and keep baby foods at perfect temperature for hours. Easy-access zipper side pocket for baby wipes. A Changing Mat included, Size: 25.7*14.2 inches. A great baby shower gift!
SATISFACTION GUARANTEE -- 30 days free exchange and 90 days warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,422 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
